sqlMap.select:
select new com.jshx.whpxzxk.entity.CheManLic(t.id, t.areaName, t.companyName, t.ratingAgencies, t.receiveDate, t.dealDate, t.licenseValid, t.receivePerson, t.checkPerson,t.createUserID,t.auditState) from CheManLic t where t.delFlag = 0
and t.deptId in (:deptCodes)
and t.id in (:ids)
and t.areaId = :areaId
and t.companyName like :companyName
and t.ratingAgencies like :ratingAgencies
and t.receiveDate >= :startReceiveDate
and t.receiveDate <= :endReceiveDate
and t.dealDate >= :startDealDate
and t.dealDate <= :endDealDate
and t.licenseValid >= :startLicenseValid
and t.licenseValid <= :endLicenseValid
and t.receivePerson like :receivePerson
and t.checkPerson like :checkPerson
and t.auditState = :auditState
and charindex(t.companyId,:companmyIds) >0
and t.companyId = :companyId
and ( t.companyName like :searchLike or t.ratingAgencies like :searchLike)
order by t.createTime desc
SELECT t.ROW_ID as id, t.CREATETIME as createTime,t.COMPANY_NAME as companyName from CHE_MAN_LIC t where t.delFlag=0 order by t.CREATETIME desc
select count(*) from CHE_MAN_LIC t where t.delFlag=0
